== JAP_WS_LOCAL_PYTHON ==
According to [https://github.com/jvansteirteghem/jap/blob/master/JAP_WS_LOCAL_PYTHON/README.txt README.txt].

 * PRE-INSTALLATION
   * install PYTHON ">= 2.7 & < 3.0"
   * install [http://twistedmatrix.com/trac/wiki/Downloads TWISTED]
   * install [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/pyOpenSSL PYOPENSSL]
   * install [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/autobahn AUTOBAHN]
 * SETUP
   * unzip JAP_WS_LOCAL_PYTHON-X.X.X.zip
   * open JAP_WS_LOCAL_PYTHON-X.X.X
   * configure JAP_WS_LOCAL.json ([EXAMPLES])
   * execute JAP_WS_LOCAL.bat

== JAP_WS_LOCAL_NODE ==
According to [https://github.com/jvansteirteghem/jap/blob/master/JAP_WS_LOCAL_NODE/README.txt README.txt].

 * Pre-installation
   * [INSTALL_NODE install NODE >= 0.8.0]
 * SETUP
   * unzip JAP_LOCAL_NODE-X.X.X.zip
   * open JAP_LOCAL_NODE-X.X.X
   * configure JAP_LOCAL_NODE.json.js ([EXAMPLES])
   * execute JAP_LOCAL_NODE.bat

== APPLY ==
  * FIREFOX
    * click TOOLS, OPTIONS
    * click ADVANCED, NETWORK, SETTINGS
    * check MANUAL PROXY CONFIGURATION
    * in SOCKS write 127.0.0.1 and LOCAL_PROXY_SERVER.PORT
    * check SOCKS v5
    * click OK
    * click OK
  * INTERNET EXPLORER
    * click TOOLS, INTERNET OPTIONS
    * click CONNECTIONS, LAN SETTINGS
    * uncheck AUTOMATICALLY DETECT PROXY SETTINGS
    * uncheck USE A PROXY AUTOMATIC CONFIGURATION SCRIPT
    * check USE A PROXY SERVER FOR YOUR LAN (THESE SETTINGS WILL NOT APPLY TO DAIL-UP OR VPN CONNECTIONS)
    * click ADVANCED
    * in SOCKS write 127.0.0.1 and LOCAL_PROXY_SERVER.PORT
    * click OK
    * click OK
    * click OK
